mdRecord.dcterms:description: "...[Salisbury House] was built by cosmetic magnate Carl Weeks and his wife, Edith Van Slyke Weeks, between 1923 and 1928. Salisbury House was modeled after the King's House in Salisbury, England..." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salisbury_House_%28Des_Moines,_Iowa%29 [work]
